item.title: 舒默和杰弗里斯要求特朗普在关门迫在眉睫之前举行会议

item.title: 试管婴儿中断，Kindbody 的故事：胚胎混淆
item.description:

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯：欧洲央行处于 "良好平衡"，无需进一步放宽政策
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，欧洲央行可能已经完成了降低借贷成本的工作，任何进一步的宽松政策都需要对价格和经济增长前景做出有意义的改变。【原文：The European Central Bank is probably done lowering borrowing costs, with any further easing needing meaningful changes to the outlook for prices and economic growth, Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras said.】

item.title: 金德芭的故事E2，胚胎混淆（播客）
item.description: Dina 和 B 来到《金德博得》进行他们梦想多年的胚胎移植。但医生传来的消息却让他们怀疑来到《金体》是否是个错误。在《试管婴儿中断，金德芭迪的故事》第二集中，彭博社记者杰基-达瓦洛斯调查了出错的原因，并发现这次错误并非孤立事件。【原文：Dina and B arrive at Kindbody for the embryo transfer they’ve dreamed about for years. But their doctor delivers news that will make them question whether coming to Kindbody was a mistake. In Episode 2 of IVF Disrupted, The Kindbody Story, Bloomberg reporter Jackie Davalos investigates what went wrong and discovers that this error wasn’t an isolated incident.】

item.title: 经济反弹褪去，股市涨势有可能失去动力
item.description: 今年以来，尽管全球贸易战、挥之不去的财政担忧以及 9 月份的黯淡声誉，美国股市仍在不断攀升，创下历史新高。但对于担心美股涨势能否持久的投资者来说，经济可能发出了警告：美股涨势即将消退。【原文：US stocks have defied skeptics this year as they climbed to records despite a global trade war, lingering fiscal fears and September’s gloomy reputation. But for investors fretting about the rally’s durability, the economy may be sending a warning that the momentum is about to fade.】

item.title: 斯奇鲁纳称欧洲央行可应对下行风险并维持利率不变
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员爱德华-斯奇鲁纳（Edward Scicluna）表示，即使考虑到经济面临下行风险，以及 2027 年通胀率预测略低于 2% 的目标，欧洲央行的利率 "维持在目前的水平就可以了"。【原文：The European Central Bank’s interest rates are “fine where they are,” even when considering downside risks to the economy and an inflation forecast slightly below the 2% target in 2027, Governing Council member Edward Scicluna said.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯表示希腊欢迎更多跨境银行交易
item.description: 希腊银行行长亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，希腊对更多跨境银行交易持开放态度，无论这些交易是来自外国投资者对希腊金融业的投资，还是来自本地贷款机构的海外扩张。【原文：Greece is open to more cross-border banking deals, whether they stem from foreign investors in its financial sector or from local lenders expanding abroad, Bank of Greece Governor Yannis Stournaras said.】

item.title: 前华尔街交易员在土耳其股票调查中获释
item.description: 据国营阿纳多卢通讯社周五晚间报道，土耳其当局在对涉嫌操纵股票的调查中逮捕了 13 人，释放了 6 人。【原文：Turkish authorities arrested 13 people and released six in an investigation into alleged stock manipulation, state-run Anadolu Agency reported Friday evening.】

item.title: 部长称意大利 2025 年预算缺口或已低于 3
item.description: 意大利财政部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）表示，意大利今年的预算缺口可能已经低于产出的 3%，从而使其能够比想象中更早地摆脱欧盟施加的财政枷锁。【原文：Italy’s budget shortfall may fall below 3% of output already this year, allowing it to leave fiscal shackles imposed by the European Union sooner than thought, according to Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti.】

item.title: 特朗普访英的技术承诺将考验紧张的电网
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）和OpenAI等美国公司近日承诺向英国的人工智能项目投资310亿英镑（约合418亿美元），但业内专家表示，英国老化的电网和全球最高的电价可能会削弱这一承诺。【原文：Microsoft Corp. and OpenAI are among the US firms that have in recent days pledged to invest £31 billion ($41.8 billion) into artificial intelligence projects in Britain, but industry experts say the commitment could be undermined by the UK’s aging power grid and some of the world’s highest electricity prices.】

item.title: 中国对美磁铁出口下滑，但整体出货量上升
item.description: 尽管在中国政府最近放宽限制之后，整体出口继续反弹，但中国 8 月份运往美国的稀土磁铁数量仍有所下降。【原文：China’s shipments of rare-earth magnets to the US dropped in August, even as overall exports continued to rebound following a recent easing of Beijing’s restrictions.】

item.title: Agoda 就新加坡 "不当 "裁员通知致歉
item.description: 在线旅游预订平台 Agoda 在新加坡的离职协议中使用了 "不恰当 "的措辞，并因此受到批评，此前，Agoda 曾警告被解雇的员工不要向当局或工会提出此事。【原文：Online travel booking platform Agoda apologized for including “inappropriate” language as part of severance agreements in Singapore, after drawing criticism for warning laid-off staff not to raise the matter to authorities or labor unions.】

item.title: 陷入困境的汽车零部件公司 First Brands 因贷款骤降而陷入沉寂
item.description: First Brands 集团的债权人正在统计数十亿美元的纸面损失，并试图评估围绕这家汽车零部件供应商的未决问题所造成的不断扩大的损失。【原文：Creditors to First Brands Group are tallying paper losses in the billions of dollars and trying to assess the widening damage from the unanswered questions swirling around the auto-parts supplier.】

item.title: 特朗普以 10 万美元 H-1B 费用打造美国移民镀金时代
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统在全面改革美国合法移民制度方面迈出了迄今为止最广泛的一步，他发表了两份声明，明确支持世界上最富有的未来外籍工人。【原文：President Donald Trump took his most extensive step yet toward overhauling the US legal migration system, with a pair of proclamations that explicitly favor the wealthiest of the world’s prospective expat workers.】
